about_the_game:
Experience an epic competition where only the best of the best will survive! Invoke unrelenting carnage across more than 50 minigames designed to test contestants’ patience, coordination, and of course, friendships. Say goodbye to Grandma as you push her into a deadly lava pit from your dungeon perch - haha nerd! Better luck next time to your roommate who got toasted by a falling bomb on the “relaxing” sandy beach. Competitors, ready those reflexes to go head-to-(bobble) head!




  • 50+ mini games
  • Free for all, 2v2, 3v1 and various win methods (coins, survival, etc)
  • Unlock collectibles and use them to create custom characters
  • Play friends online, in person, or with Steam's Remote Play



Enter the arena as a mischievous bobble-head made from collectible components - matched or mismatched to your liking! A grizzly bear head on Santa’s body? Whatever you need to psych out the competition.

  • Choose from 200+ collectible toy pieces
  • Create a crazy name for the announcer to call out during gameplay
  • Select a "voice pack" for audible emotes during gameplay like jump, hurt, win, and lose
  • Keep playing to unlock 'mystery toy boxes' for new collectible toys




Everyone is welcome: simple controls, adjustable difficulty modes, and CPUs are there to accommodate all skill levels. Test diabolical strategies in practice modes before hopping into competitive tournaments.

  • Simple controls with 1-2 buttons
  • Practice Mode before each game
  • Three vs. one, two vs. two, or total free-for-all matches
  • Difficulty Modes for any skill level

name: Floor is...What!?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86 32 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get ready for epic 4-player bobbleheaded toy pandemonium! Play 50+ mini games that will test your skills and friendships, as you battle across lava, space, ice and more! In Floor is…What!? You don’t need to be ashamed of how good the mayhem feels.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
